title: Could Bortles Get Cut?, Eagles/Dolphins Camp Breakdown (Football 8/21)
description:
Will Brinson and Pete Prisco break down whether Blake Bortles could end up being cut (4:40), the quarterback battles between Trevor Siemian/Paxton Lynch, Mitchell Trubisky/Mike Glennon, Tom Savage/Deshaun Watson and Alex Smith/Patrick Mahomes (12:26). They also project how big of numbers Christian McCaffrey could put up in 2017 (22:43). Then the guys dive into the latest episode of Game of Thrones (SPOILER ALERT). Will and Jason La Canfora then break down JLC's trip to see the Eagles and Dolphins practice together (42:50), talk about Andrew Luck's injury (54:14) and when we can expect to see Le'Veon Bell back at Steelers camp (57:00). ​
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
